Test Case Name: Create new trip with valid data
Test Steps:
1. Tap + button
2. Enter trip name
3. Select start and end dates
4. Add notes (optional)
5. Tap Save
Expected Result: Trip is created and appears in trip list

Test Case Name: Create trip with invalid dates (end before start)
Test Steps:
1. Tap + button
2. Enter trip name
3. Select end date before start date
4. Attempt to save
Expected Result: Validation error shown, trip not created
